tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vendors (
  vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vendor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  contact_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE deliveries (
  delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vendor_id INT NOT NULL,
  delivery_date DATE NOT NULL,
  item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_vendor_id FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE restocking (
  restock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  delivery_id INT NOT NULL,
  restock_date DATE NOT NULL,
  restock_quantity INT NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_delivery_id FOREIGN KEY (delivery_id) REFERENCES deliveries(delivery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vendor (vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
vendor_name TEXT,
contact_person TEXT,
phone_number TEXT);

CREATE TABLE product (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
product_name TEXT,
price DECIMAL(10,2),
vendor_id INT REFERENCES vendor(vendor_id));

CREATE TABLE delivery (delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
delivery_date DATE,
product_id INT REFERENCES product(product_id),
quantity INT);

CREATE TABLE vendors (
  vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vendor_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_email VARCHAR(100),
  contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(100),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  vendor_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE deliveries (
  delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  delivery_date DATE,
  quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE restocks (
  restock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  restock_date DATE,
  restock_quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
  supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_email VARCHAR(100),
  contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
);
